com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.local

Interface TeamManagerLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ManagerLocal<Team,TeamId,TeamDTO,TeamIdDTO>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TeamManager

    public interface TeamManagerLocal
extends ManagerLocal<Team,TeamId,TeamDTO,TeamIdDTO>
    Local interface that manages the Team entities.
